CustomField.description: Stores the benefit types passed by the associated HI application record.
CustomField.formula: if(Medical_Renewal__c, 'Medical; ', '') & if(Dental_Renewal__c, 'Dental; ', '') & if(Vision_Renewal__c, 'Vision; ', '') & if(Life_Renewal__c, 'Life; ', '') & if(Long_Term_Disability_Renewal__c, 'LTD; ', '') & if(Short_Term_Disability_Renewal__c, 'STD; ', '') & if(FSA_Renewal__c, 'FSA; ', '') & if(DCA_Renewal__c, 'DCA; ', '') & if(HSA_Renewal__c, 'HSA; ', '')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the benefit types passed by the associated HI application record.
CustomField.label: Benefit Types
